name: Adobe Lightroom 5
content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Select the 64-bit setup file
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Adobe/Adobe Photoshop Lightroom/lightroom.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating 64-bit Wine prefix.
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Setting Windows 7 mode for Wine
    key: Version
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: win7
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: atmlib
    arch: win64
    description: Installing atmlib
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: gdiplus
    arch: win64
    description: Installing gdiplus
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: mfc42
    arch: win64
    description: Installing mfc42
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: msasn1
    arch: win64
    description: Installing msasn1
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: msxml3
    arch: win64
    description: Installing msxml3
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: msxml6
    arch: win64
    description: Installing msxml6
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2008
    arch: win64
    description: Installing vcrun2008
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2010
    arch: win64
    description: Installing vcrun2010
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2012
    arch: win64
    description: Installing vcrun2012
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: corefonts
    arch: win64
    description: Installing corefonts
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Installing Lightroom Classic 64-bit
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
